1.1.name: wordpress/social-display
1.1.description:
Social Display is a simple plugin which creates a widget on the WordPress dashboard for your dynamic sidebars. This widget will display social media logos or text for Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn. Social Media links can be easily added and updated from the Social Display Options page under Plugins. If you do not wish to display a network it can be easily shown or hidden from the options page as well. This plugin was written as a means to provide an easy way to add social media images/links to a dynamically generated sidebar.

  • Supports links for Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn - More to be added in later versions
  • Dedicated Options Page found under the Plugins Menu of the Dashboard
  • Easily show / hide networks
  • Dynamic widget that can be added to any sidebar within a WordPress Theme

If you liked this plugin please check out our portfolio at Web Unity Design Furthermore if you want regular
